name: Nandhini Meenakshi
summary: Highly ambitious and inquisitive person, aiming to join Indian Civil Services, and looking for an environment that provides generous opportunities for learning, solving and innovating
Passionate about numbers and computing, I have demonstrated my technical finesse throughout School and in Undergrad in Computer Science Engineering

With a brief stint in the Civil Services preparation, I hold a fair knowledge in the basic polity, socio-economic structure & the historical legacy of my country and its equation with the world powers

Being an ardent politics follower and trained in Political Science and International Relations (Masters level) for the Civil Services specialization paper, I look forward to put my skills into field-level politics

education.name: College of Engineering, Guindy, Anna University, Chennai
education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Science

education.name: Anna Adarsh Matriculation Higher Secondary School, Chennai

projects.title: Final year thesis - Query specific Multiple Newspaper articles summarization
projects.desc: An application to provide a coherent summary from related news articles based on data mining techniques in Python

leadership: Headed the Industrial relations team of the University Technical Symposium- ABACUS'18, coordinated with 7+ MNCs and Startups like Amazon and Freshworks; Collaborated with industries and sought sponsorship worth $6000 USD
Quality control and co-ordination with the Content, Marketing, HR and Industrial Relations teams for the 25-year old  event - Abacus'18
Led the Indian Team at the International Summer School Programme'17, sponsored by the University of  Edinburgh, UK
achievements: Bagged the Technical and Innovative Project Award from the University's Industrial Collaboration Cell for the VR project
Scored top 1% of the state with Centums in Mathematics and Chemistry in 12th board examination and ranked first in the District - Chennai in 10th board examination
Represented Chennai Zone as a finalist of 'National Balshree Awards-2012' for creative writing, one of the highest civilian award for school students in India
Awarded 'The Best budding writer' in the awareness drive conducted by Narcotics Control Bureau
Secured second position in the International Olympiad of Mathematics consecutively for 4 years- 2010, 2011, 2012, 2013
